Posts.Content: The technology has been developed in the US and it is available there. You can check it out on the company's site at www.premammogram.com Good luck and please tell all your girlfriends as this could save their lives. Jen
Posts.Title: New Hope in Early Diagnosis

Posts.Content: I would like to alert everyone to some wonderful new technology that is going to help women of all ages, particularly women under 40, with early detection. The technology is FDA approved to "Perform and Document the Clinical Breast Exam" and it is up to four (4) times more sensitive that the human touch. Please support this fantastic new technology so we can all benefit from having a regular "SureTouch" exam. http://suretouch.com.au Many thanks for your kind support Jennifer
Posts.Title: New Hope in Early Diagnosis
